# Timing iterative gene search alternative

```{r iterative-gene-search-alt, message = FALSE}



proc_time_add_genes = function(sce , n_genes_total = 150, batch , p = 3){
  t0 = proc.time()
  
  stat = suppressWarnings( get_lp_norm_dist_alternative(sce, genes = rownames(sce), batch = batch , n.neigh = 5 , nPC = 50 , genes.predict = rownames(sce) , p = p) )
  colnames(stat) = c("gene" , "dist_all")
    
  genes_all = add_first_gene(sce , stat, batch = batch , n.neigh = 5, p = 3 , K = 5)
  t1 = proc.time()
  t = c(t1[["elapsed"]] - t0[["elapsed"]])
  
  while(length(genes_all) < n_genes_total){
    
    stat_genes = suppressWarnings( get_lp_norm_dist_alternative(sce , genes = genes_all , batch = batch, n.neigh = 5 , nPC = NULL , genes.predict = rownames(sce) , p = p) )
    colnames(stat_genes) = c("gene" , "dist")   
    stat_genes = stat_genes[!stat_genes$gene %in% genes_all , ] 
    stat_genes = merge(stat_genes , stat)
    
    stat_genes$dist_ratio = stat_genes$dist - stat_genes$dist_all 
      
    idx = which(stat_genes$dist_ratio == max(stat_genes$dist_ratio))
    gene = stat_genes$gene[idx[1]]
    genes_all = c(genes_all , as.character(gene))
    current.t = proc.time()
    t = c(t , current.t[["elapsed"]] - t0[["elapsed"]])
  }
  return(t)
}
  
  
n_genes.grid = seq(1000,10000,1000)
samples = unique(sce$sample)
n_samples.grid = c(1:6)

options.grid = lapply(n_samples.grid , function(n_samples){
  out = data.frame(n_samples = n_samples , n_genes = n_genes.grid)
  return(out)
})
options.grid = do.call(rbind , options.grid)

stat = bplapply(1:nrow(options.grid) , function(i){
  n = options.grid$n_genes[i]
  n_samples = options.grid$n_samples[i]
  current.sce = retain_only_hvgs(sce[, sce$sample %in% samples[1:n_samples]], n = n, var.thresh = 0)
  rownames.sce = rownames(current.sce)
  idx = which(!grepl("mt-" , rownames.sce) & !grepl("MT-" , rownames.sce) & !grepl("Mt-" , rownames.sce))
  current.sce = current.sce[idx,]
  out = proc_time_add_genes(current.sce , n_genes_total = 150, batch = NULL)  
  current.stat = data.frame(n_genes = seq(1,150,1) , time = out)  
  current.stat$n_genes_init = n
  current.stat$n_samples = n_samples
  current.stat$n_cells = ncol(current.sce)
  saveRDS(current.stat , file = paste0(root.dir , "data/processed_time/geneBasis/" , system , "/batched_updated/nSamples_" , n_samples, "__nGenes_" , 
  n , ".Rds"))  
  return(current.stat)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
stat = do.call(rbind , stat)
saveRDS(stat , file = paste0(root.dir , "data/processed_time/geneBasis/" , system , "/stat_unparalleled_batched_updated_2.Rds"))
```
